General.Name: Waja Konsortium Bhd
General.Description: Waja Konsortium Berhad, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, markets, sells, services, and trades in cables, connectors, and related products. It provides cyber security services and information and technology products and related services. The company also engages in property development and general construction activities. It serves small and medium sized companies, and multinational corporations operating in the connected homes and offices, smart connected devices, white goods, automotive, interactive kiosks, security, and medical and other industries. The company operates in Singapore, Malaysia, and the United States. The company was formerly known as ConnectCounty Holdings Berhad and changed its name to Waja Konsortium Berhad in July 2021. Waja Konsortium Berhad was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
